column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Today's highlight though was the first featuring of AIC's collection of Japanese Buddhist Kesa (pronounced like quesadilla
column2: without the "dilla") exhibit. In didn't know anything about Kesa's or any other type of vestments before visiting
column3: and now I do. Â The highlight of this visit was Callihan Aduzzi a museum employee assigned to the exhibit who could not be more helpful
